msg: fixed failed unit test after upgrading from xerces 2.9.1 to 2.10.0

author: veithen
msg: Leverage OMNavigator#visited() to simplify the code in SwitchingWrapper.

author: dblevins
msg: use jvm impl of javax.xml.stream.XMLOutputFactory and javax.xml.stream.XMLInputFactory

author: veithen
msg: We can only switch once we get past the last node created by the builder. If we switch when we reach that node, then the information returned may be inaccurate because the node may have been modified.
As a side effect of the fix we no longer need to look ahead one node (at least not in SwitchingWrapper; OMNavigator still fetches the next node). This greatly simplifies the code.
